item.title: Alfred Open Chinese Convert
item.author: Author
item.description: Since Mac OS finally removed support for Python2 in 12.3, the workflows written in Python2 in Alfred 4 are no longer available. The amowu/alfred-chinese-converter I was using before is also no longer updated (it's still in Alfred 2). So I built one with Golang + awgo + opencc, eliminating the dependency on Python, and Alfred upgrades no longer run into Python version problems.
